name: jQuery Post Preview
author: Dimox

sections.description: Live post preview on “Write/Edit post” page of WordPress admin area using jQuery. If you don’t like WordPress built-in Visual Editor (because it puts a lot of unnecessary tags or by any other reasons), but you want to have live post preview like in Visual Editor, this plugin may be useful for you.
sections.installation:
1. Upload jquery-post-preview folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Deactivate Visual Editor in your user profile.
  4. That’s all.

You’ll find “Preview” button on “Write/Edit post” page above the post text field.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Changes to work with WordPress 3.3.

0.1

  • The initial version.
